price: 30. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo sama falay, Rabbigood wuxuu galin Naxariistiisa (Jannada), taasina waa Liibaanta Cad.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-mubīnu
